extendedInfo.description: ** SALE: To celebrate the release of Spira 2, all my X Defence Pro games are discounted!A tower defence game with a twist. You must defend your base from enemy attack by building / upgrading defence towers. Money is awarded for kills to spend on upgrades. Interest is earned on the money not spent.** Samsung Galaxy S2 Issues: If the game is randomly crashing for you, please play with the sound off from the options screen. I'm working to find a solution.** Free, limited, Ad supported version available** News, FAQ and Hi Scores at:** http://funqai.com/and_spiradef.html

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: This game is a timeless classic. Always fun even after all these years. Will we see a spira defense 3? I hope so.
reviews.author: Chris Ball

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: The graphics are basic, but work well. Gameplay is exelelent. If you like tower defense games, this will do nicely. Go for something with a twist, go for this game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Good game easy to learn to be good
reviews.author: james phillips

reviews.title: Still crashes on S2
reviews.comment: Still crashes after a few rounds on my Galaxy S2. 1.42 update didn\'t help. Such a shame. Used to work for hours on my old phone. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on galaxy epic 4g
reviews.comment: Worked great on my evolution but crashes constantly on epic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes Pont sgs2
reviews.comment: After 2 min or three the game freezes. Unplayable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SGS2 FREEZE SOLUTION
reviews.comment: Get a OC app like SETCPU and set it on minimum value 500mhz because when you suddenly get much more happening in the game CPU can\'t be able to take it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good game. Need to remove time limit. Makes pusher towers useless in later levels. Buttons are also very hard to press.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good way to get the one tower achive is to us a chain in the center
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Soooo fun.....best way to get to level 75 is to build a rapid turret, upgrading fast til around level 13 then holdingoff for the money int.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. Needs to be an increase in cash for kills in the later levels. Still an awesome time killer!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game! The achvmnt. for 1M kills is way too high tho! Also, it does get brutal around wv 100...any updates appreciated!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Frustrating, yet soooOOOO addictive...!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple but fun and adictive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very addictive.. Cant seem to get pass lvl109.. -Aleks on global highscores
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good game But the screen is too big Buttons to upgrade are difficult to use Galaxy Plz improve
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: please fix money or cost of towers so we can make it passed the 80s, or is that done on purpose? Mmm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need countdown timer, how much real damage is being done per shot after all upgrades and more money per level after 72
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need more updates
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: In spite of its simplistic design, it is a very enjoyable game. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User
